response.original_title: Heart Mountain: Three Years in a Relocation Center
response.overview: A documentary film about the internment of Japanese Americans at Heart Mountain, Wyoming during World War II. The program, hosted by Jan Yanehiro, proceeds in part as a series of interviews. It also includes archival film footage of Heart Mountain and Japanese Americans during World War II, as well as present day footage of the Heart Mountain landscape.
response.title: Heart Mountain: Three Years in a Relocation Center
